section.title: Scenario
section.p: Before using advanced audio and video features, you can check whether the current device supports them to avoid performance degradation or feature unavailability on low-end devices. Based on the return value of this method, you can decide whether to show or enable the corresponding feature buttons, or prompt users with appropriate messages when the device capability is insufficient.
